posts.post_title: T205's Last chance - please don't make me go to Ebay
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Russ Bright
I will consider any reasonable offers - i can't justify giving ebay and paypal 15% of what I sell these for - i would rather make a good deal to someone here - Some don't have prices - just make me a fair offer - I can make scans of anything - ambrosia2@hotmail.com

I still have all of this - 

PSA graded

Bob Groom PSA4 - $52
Rube Marquard PSA5 - $300

Hoblitzell (Cin after 1908 - flip says "correct") Polar Bear - GAI 3.5 - $75

Charles "boss" Schmidt - SGC30 (minor paperloss on back) - $30
George "Hooks" Wiltse (Both Ears Variation) SGC20 - $30
